mapper.insert: insert into t_keys (kid, kname, ktype, ktypevalue, kcnname, kusvalue, kchange) values (#{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ktypevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kcnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kusvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kchange,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_keys set kname = #{kname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ktype = #{ktype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ktypevalue = #{ktypevalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kcnname = #{kcnname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kusvalue = #{kusvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kchange = #{kchange,jdbcType=BIT} where kid = #{kid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select kid, kname, ktype, ktypevalue, kcnname, kusvalue, kchange from t_keys
